=======================
 coopr.pysos CHANGELOG
=======================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.8
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Extensive py3k fixes.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.7
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Resolving Python 3.x portability issue.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.6
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Reformatting with reindent.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.5
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Migrating to use entry points rather than explicit script installation.
  This allows for automatic installation and localization on MS Windows.

- Deprecating the use of 'Model' as the base abstract Model class.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.4
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Updating Coopr package README files to point to the new
  Google Groups mailing lists.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release of Coopr to create the coopr.pysos package.

- See coopr.dist for previous ChangeLog information related to Coopr.

- Update PyPI categories.

- Setting svn:ignore properties.
